blogPost.excerpt: Record Screen or Webcam and Share instantly. No need to install any application. Just super fast recording and share. Live Streaming Feature to be added very soon. Super fast recordings to give feedback to your team, education, creating product demos.
blogPost.body: Record Screen or Webcam and Share instantly. No need to install any application. Just super fast recording and share. Live Streaming Feature to be added very soon. Super fast recordings to give feedback to your team, education, creating product demos.
blogPost.title: Record Webcam + Screen > Share - Simple Screen + Webcam Recording. Share after recording
blogPost.author: Hammad Akbar

localize.description: 录制屏幕或网络摄像头，并立即共享。无需安装任何应用程序。只是超快的录制和分享。即将添加直播功能。超快录制，为您的团队、培训、创建产品演示提供反馈。
localize.tagline: 简单的屏幕+网络摄像头录制。录制后共享

localize.description: 錄製屏幕或網絡攝像頭，並立即共享。無需安裝任何應用程序。只是超快的錄製和分享。即將添加直播功能。超快錄製，爲您的團隊、培訓、創建產品演示提供反饋。
localize.tagline: 簡單的屏幕+網絡攝像頭錄製。錄製後共享

previous.excerpt: A list of 9,000 badly executed products and apps. Are you looking for project ideas? Then this list could be useful to you. - 2,599 iOS Apps - 1,226 Chrome Extensions - 240 Web Apps (from ProductHunt) - 4,999 Android Apps Airtable access + JSON files
previous.title: Validated ideas 2.0 - 9,000 popular but poorly executed apps

localize.description: 9000个执行不佳的产品和应用程序的列表。您在寻找项目创意吗？那么这份清单可能会对你有用。-2599个iOS应用-1226个Chrome扩展-240个Web应用(来自ProductHunt)-4999个Android应用Airtable Access+JSON文件
localize.tagline: 9,000个受欢迎但执行情况不佳的应用程序

localize.description: 9000個執行不佳的產品和應用程序的列表。您在尋找項目創意嗎？那麼這份清單可能會對你有用。-2599個iOS應用-1226個Chrome擴展-240個Web應用(來自ProductHunt)-4999個Android應用Airtable Access+JSON文件
localize.tagline: 9,000個受歡迎但執行情況不佳的應用程序

next.excerpt: How colorful was your Instagram in 2020? Get an interactive report about the most prominent colors you've shared in your posts throughout the year. Discover your personal or brand palette or reconnect with your most colourful experiences. Now on iOS & Android.
next.title: Year of Colour 2020 - Find out which colours you most used on Instagram this year

localize.description: 2020年，你的Instagram有多丰富多彩？获取一份关于你全年在帖子中分享的最突出颜色的互动报告。发现您的个人或品牌调色板，或重新连接您最丰富多彩的体验。现在用的是iOS和Android。
localize.tagline: 找出你今年在Instagram上最常用的颜色

localize.description: 2020年，你的Instagram有多豐富多彩？獲取一份關於你全年在帖子中分享的最突出顏色的互動報告。發現您的個人或品牌調色板，或重新連接您最豐富多彩的體驗。現在用的是iOS和Android。
localize.tagline: 找出你今年在Instagram上最常用的顏色
